Crimes.Crime_Name: Submitting Counterfeit Documents under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the IAD err in finding Kobrosli inadmissible under s. 40(1)(a) for misrepresentation?
Crimes.Outcome: Federal Court dismissed Kobrosli's application, upholding the removal order.
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Minister appealed ID's decision to IAD; judicial review followed
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Submission of a counterfeit document in study permit application
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Misrepresentation could have induced an error in immigration administration
Crimes.Application_Factor: Document submitted but application withdrawn before decision
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to IAD's interpretation of s. 40(1)(a)
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Withdrawal of application prior to decision

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the IAD err in finding Kobrosli inadmissible under s. 40(1)(a) of the IRPA for misrepresentation?
Crimes.Application_Facts: Submitted false document for study permit renewal, later withdrew application
Crimes.Remedy_Requested: Judicial review to overturn IAD decision
Crimes.Defendant_Behavior: Submitted counterfeit document then withdrew application
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Risk of inducing error in immigration administration
Crimes.Legal_Standard: s. 40(1)(a) IRPA â€“ misrepresentation or withholding material facts
Crimes.Assessment_Factor: Potential to induce error even if application withdrawn
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Minister's appeal of ID decision to IAD
Crimes.Evidence_Assessed: Authenticity and intent behind document submission
Crimes.Cause_Description: Submitted false document to renew study permit
Crimes.Evidence_Handling: Document examined as part of administrative review
Crimes.Misrepresentation_Element: Submission of counterfeit document with immigration application
Crimes.Decision_Rationale: Misrepresentation risked incorrect administration of the Act
